oubliette-parent.description: Parent Oubliette MCP server for recursive gogol spawning

_comments.http_proxy_example: External MCP servers (like Ant) are accessed via the HTTP proxy. When session_message includes context.http_proxies, oubliette-client starts a proxy on 127.0.0.1:19999. Example MCP config for Ant:

ant_example.description: Ant MCP server via oubliette proxy (requires http_proxies in session context)
